ruleContent.content: var match = src.match(/"images":\s*(\[[^\]]*?\])/); var data = []; if (match) { var arrStr = match[1]; try { data = JSON.parse(arrStr.replace(/'/g, '"')); } catch (e) { data = eval(arrStr); } } var options={ "headers": { "User-Agent": "Mozilla/5.0 (Linux; Android 13; PFJM10 Build/TP1A.220905.001; wv) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Version/4.0 Chrome/135.0.7049.111 Mobile Safari/537.36", "referer": "https://www.favcomic.net/" } }; h=JSON.stringify(options) var imgTags = data.map(item => ``).join('\n'); imgTags;
